com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.dnd
Class GridDropTarget

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event.BaseObservable
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.dnd.DropTarget
          com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.dnd.GridDropTarget
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
public class GridDropTarget
extends DropTarget

A DropTarget implementation for Grids. Supports both inserts and appends, specified using DropTarget.setOperation(com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.dnd.DND.Operation).

Supported drag data:

  • A single ModelData instance.
  • A List of ModelData instances.
  • A List of TreeStoreModel instances (children are ignored).

          Creates a new drop target instance.
